dct_description_sm: At page top, above map: DE LA SPHERE. [Page] 15[,] FIGURE VI. [Page] 15 (map top right). Issued in his: Description de L’Univers, Tome I. -- Paris, 1683. Subsequent edition in 1688.

With German inscription on the plate. Issued in his German editions: Beschreibung des ganzen Welt-kreisses ..., I, Franckfurt, 1684 and Description de L’Univers ..., Francfourt sur le Main, Chez Jean David Zunner, 1686.

With the entire plate as a mirror image, including the unrolled map. Der Mittel Kreiss. (page top, above map). Fig. 6. (map top right). Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des gantzen weltkreises ..., J.A. Jung ... Franckfurt am Mayn, 1719.
LC 3447, 4280; BN Manesson-Mallet I A & I B; Shirley 518; Sabin 44130.
Small unrolled double hemisphere map draped over a table and two globes. California as an island with a rounded northern coast. Map entitled, “Carte Generale Dv Monde.”
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
